definitions.definition: A con artist ; someone who pulls confidence games ; a swindler , scammer , huckster , hustler , and/or charlatan .
A manipulator or otherwise generally corrupt person who "games" a system, group of people, or other entity for selfish gains; especially of a political " sell-out " perceived as lacking integrity .

main_definition: ( informal , originally Canada , US ) A con artist ; someone who pulls confidence games ; a swindler , scammer , huckster , hustler , and/or charlatan .
secondary_definitions: ( colloquial , especially Internet ) A manipulator or otherwise generally corrupt person who "games" a system, group of people, or other entity for selfish gains; especially of a political " sell-out " perceived as lacking integrity .
